title: David Arkenstone - Myths and Legends - DTS Surround
description:
First of all I would like to say this is a true DTS recording and as
such can only be played back on DTS hardware. If you get static
then you do not have a true DST decoder.

About the recording:
I made this as a learning experiment.
Each channel was created as a mono wave in Sound Forge 9.
The individual channels were then encoded with SurCode DTS encoder.
Only the FL,FR,LR and RR channels were used, no Subwoofer or Center channel
were encoded. Your equipment may "synthisize" these channels.
The encoded trackes were burned to an Audio CD image with Nero 8.

About the Album:
Myths and Legends is a two disc set.
The two discs are ment to be played back at the same time
on two different CD players. I encoded CD 1 on the front
channels and CD 2 on the rear.

About the artist:
David Arkenstone is an amazing artist.
More information can be found here: <a href="
http://www.davidarkenstone.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.davidarkenstone.com/</a>
If you enjoy this ablum please support the artist by
buying a copy like I did.
